members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetContainers gets the containers and binds the lists to the controls the buttons
An enum indicating what type of containers to load A string that identifies whether the skin is Host "[G]" or Site "[L]" The folder to search for skins -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wizard_NextButtonClickruns when the next Button is clicked. It provides a mechanism for cancelling the page change if certain conditions aren't met.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
